/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the bright blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural diversity and the constant movement of its streets.
